blogPost.excerpt: KanbanTab is the ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks and build the momentum to get things done! This tool is completely free with no ads and requires no registration.
blogPost.body: KanbanTab is the ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks and build the momentum to get things done! This tool is completely free with no ads and requires no registration.
blogPost.title: KanbanTab - An ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks
blogPost.author: Tomas Woksepp

localize.description: KanbanTab是一个理想的默认标签，帮助你有效地组织任务，并建立完成任务的动力! 这款工具完全免费，没有广告，无需注册。
localize.tagline: 一个理想的默认标签，帮助你有效地组织任务。

localize.description: KanbanTab是一個理想的默認標籤，幫助你有效地組織任務，並建立完成任務的動力! 這款工具完全免費，沒有廣告，無需註冊。
localize.tagline: 一個理想的默認標籤，幫助你有效地組織任務。
